title: Race Sim + Gear Check
description:
This is your longest controlled nutrition rehearsal.

Goal: Have your race kit dialed in. Know what goes in what pocket. Where each bottle is going.

Treat this as a dress rehearsal: nutrition, gear, pacing, terrain — everything.

Early effort must stay boring and easy (RPE 3-4). This is not a speed day — it’s a gut training day. The final 90-120min may allow light progression if you’re handling fuel well.

Lay out your gear and fuel the day before.

Test fluid intake, sodium, gels, calories

Gear & pack should mirror race setup

Socks, Shoes, anti chafing, use all your race day gear. No exceptions.
